locale.name: en_US
locale.message: This plugin allows to show a list of attendees of a conference. Add the corresponding navigation bar item by adding a new navbar item in Website Management > Website Headers, Footers, Lists and Navigation Bar > 3.4 Navigation Bar with label name plugins.generic.listOfAttendees.navigationTitle and URL /ocs/index.php/dw2014/dw2014/attendees (adapt the URL to your installation setup).
The List of Attendees Plugin has been disabled.
The List of Attendees Plugin has been enabled.
